quoteText:
We only retain data as needed to provide you with services.  We never log historical location data.
any such data we receive overwrites the older data.  Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs no longer than one month.
title: User logs are deleted after 30 days

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
tosdr.tldr: "Under normal conditions, we keep server access logs no longer than one month."
